DOC.criteria: Patients need extraction aesthetic area replace implant ( incisive , canine premolar ) Good general health ( ASA 1 , 2 ) Controlled periodontitis No age restriction Extraction socket buccal bone defect / buccal bone wall dehiscence Smokers > 10 cigarette per day Immune system disease Bone disease treatment medicine interfere bone metabolism
